to toil in the mines or any other

occupied in his favourite employment.
Every night a slow fever oppressed
me and I became ^nervous to a
most painful degree; a a dis-
ease I regretted the more because I had
hitherto enjoyed excellent health &
had always
boasted of the firmness^of my nerves. But I
believed that exercise and amusement
would soon drive away such sym-
-toms and I promised myself both
of these when my creation should be
complete.
